text: Henri Biancheri (30 July 1932 â€“ 1 December 2019) was a French footballer player and sports executive. He played midfielder for 14 seasons including seven at AS Monaco FC. After he retired as a player, he became a commercial director at Adidas from 1966 to 1986. Biancheri died on 1 December 2019 at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile * Profile Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Footballers from Marseille
title: Henri Biancheri
